name: Bagel And Cream Cheese
shortDescription: 66 g.Fiber. 4 g.Total Carbs. 70 g.Protein. 14 g.Fats. 8 g.
fullDescription: IngredientsIngredient Checklist 2 tablespoons 1/3-less-fat cream cheese  1 (4-ounce) bagel, split and toasted  2 tomato slices  1 (1/8-inch-thick) red onion slice, halved  ½ avocado, peeled and sliced  ⅛ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper DirectionsInstructions Checklist Step 1 Spread 1 tablespoon cream cheese over cut side of each bagel half. Top each half with 1 tomato slice, half of onion slice, and half of avocado slices. Sprinkle evenly with pepper.  Source Cooking Light Real Family Food  Nutrition Facts Per Serving: 261 calories; fat 10.5g; saturated fat 2.6g; mono fat 5.6g; poly fat 1.4g; protein 7.9g; carbohydrates 34.9g; fiber 4.9g; cholesterol 8mg; iron 1.1mg; sodium 355mg; calcium 41mg.
